languages.text: "Я? Серьезно? Ладно, голосочки, не подведите, научите ведьму стрелять из танка... Что? Нет же, во врагов!"
"Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"
languages.original_text: "Я? Серьезно? Ладно, голосочки, не подведите, научите ведьму стрелять из танка... Что? Нет же, во врагов!"

traits.locale_text: "Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to aim the tank... What? No, at the enemies!"
"Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to aim the tank... What? No, at the enemies!"
"Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to aim the tank... What? No, at the enemies!"
"Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to aim the tank... What? No, at the enemies!"
"Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"
"Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"

languages.text: «¿Yo? ¿En serio? De acuerdo, vocecillas, enseñad a la bruja cómo disparar con un tanque... ¿Qué? ¡No, contra los enemigos!».
languages.original_text: "Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Yo? ¿En serio? De acuerdo, vocecillas, enseñad a la bruja cómo disparar con un tanque... ¿Qué? ¡No, contra los enemigos!».

languages.text: “我来？真的假的？好了，我的耳语声，指导这个女巫怎么驾驶坦克吧……什么？不，当然是朝敌人开火了！”
languages.original_text: "Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"

traits.locale_text: “我来？真的假的？好了，我的耳语声，指导这个女巫怎么驾驶坦克吧……什么？不，当然是朝敌人开火了！”

languages.text: 「あたい？本当？わかったわ、囁き声が魔女にタンクからどうやって砲撃するか教えてくれる…何？だめ、敵に！」
languages.original_text: "Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"

traits.locale_text: 「あたい？本当？わかったわ、囁き声が魔女にタンクからどうやって砲撃するか教えてくれる…何？だめ、敵に！」

languages.text: « Moi ? Vraiment ? Mes petites voix, je compte sur vous pour apprendre à votre sorcière préférée à tirer avec un char... Quoi ? Mais non, voyons, sur les ennemis ! »
languages.original_text: "Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"

traits.locale_text: « Moi ? Vraiment ? Mes petites voix, je compte sur vous pour apprendre à votre sorcière préférée à tirer avec un char... Quoi ? Mais non, voyons, sur les ennemis ! »

languages.text: "Ben mi? Gerçekten mi? Pekâlâ minik seslerim, cadıya tanktan nasıl ateş edileceğini öğretin... Ne? Hayır, düşmanlara!"
languages.original_text: "Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"

traits.locale_text: "Ben mi? Gerçekten mi? Pekâlâ minik seslerim, cadıya tanktan nasıl ateş edileceğini öğretin... Ne? Hayır, düşmanlara!"

languages.text: "Ich? Wirklich? Also schön, kleine Simmen, zeigt der Hexe, wie man mit einem Panzer schießt ... Was? Nein, auf die Feinde!"
languages.original_text: "Me? Really? All right, little voices, teach the witch how to shoot from a tank... What? No, at the enemies!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich? Wirklich? Also schön, kleine Simmen, zeigt der Hexe, wie man mit einem Panzer schießt ... Was? Nein, auf die Feinde!"
